derivation: contraction for H3068 (יְהֹוָה), and meaning the same;
outline:
1. Jah (Jehovah in the shortened form)
    1. the proper name of the one true God
    2. used in many compounds
      1. names beginning with the letters 'Je'
      2. names ending with 'iah' or 'jah'
kjv_def: Jah, the Lord, most vehement. Compare names in '-iah,' '-jah.'
